title: Toothbrush
description:
A brightly colored plastic toothbrush with white bristles.

Used to talk about oral hygiene, daily routines, or something that is fresh and clean.
apple_vendor_description: The toothbrush emoji on Apple devices showcases a clean, modern design with a vibrant blue handle and crisp white bristles.  Apple's signature soft rounded edges and subtle 3D shading give it a friendly, approachable feel, as if ready for use.  This emoji is often employed to communicate about hygiene, health, or the start of a new day, bringing a fresh and positive connotation to digital conversations.
